title: MAKOTO Silk Sword Bag for Japanese Katana, Wakizashi and Chinese Tai Chi Swords
features: Deluxe silk sword bag. Double layers, made of synthetic silk.
Protect your sword against scratches and dust.
Suitable for most Japanese samurai sword katana and wakizashi, as well as Chinese Tang sword & Taichi sword.
description: The Makoto Synthetic Silk Sword Bags are made of high quality synthetic silk. They provide a gloss finish similar to silk, while maintaining premium-cloth-like thickness to enhance the protection of your beloved katana sword or wakizashi.
